; Position examples from KiCad PCB files
; These are used for unit testing position parsing

; Simple 2D position (at X Y) - coordinates in nanometers
(at 100000000 50000000)

; Position with rotation (at X Y angle) - angle in decidegrees
(at 100000000 50000000 900)

; Position with negative coordinates
(at -25000000 -30000000)

; Position with decimal values (rare, but possible)
(at 100500000 50250000 450)

; In context - footprint position
(module "Resistor_SMD:R_0805" (layer "F.Cu") (at 100000000 50000000 900))

; In context - pad position (relative to footprint)
(pad "1" smd rect (at -900000 0) (size 1000000 1200000))

; In context - text position
(fp_text reference "R1" (at 0 0 90) (layer "F.SilkS"))

; In context - via position
(via (at 105000000 55000000) (size 800000) (drill 400000))
